mapper.select: select p.id,p.name from user u join user_role ur on u.id=ur.userid join role_permission rp on rp.roleId=ur.roleid join permission p on rp.permissionid=p.id where u.account=#{account}
select state from user where account=#{account}
select password from user where account=#{account}
select account from user where email=#{email}
select account from user where phone=#{phone}
